name: Reefworld Fly / Cruise
description: Experience the adventure of a lifetime with our Reefworld Fly / Cruise tour! Discover the beauty of the Great Barrier Reef, Whitehaven Beach, and Hamilton Island in one unforgettable day. Soar above the stunning landscapes on a scenic helicopter flight and immerse yourself in the vibrant underwater world with snorkeling at the Great Barrier Reef. Enjoy a relaxing cruise through the Whitsundays, complete with breathtaking views and unforgettable memories.
departure_times: Check in at Port Of Airlie; Scenic flight to Reefworld; 2.0 hours at Cruise Whitsundays Reefworld; Cruise back to Airlie Beach
includes: Scenic helicopter flight, snorkeling gear, wetsuits, semi-submersible experience, lunch, cruise through the Whitsundays
highlights: Scenic views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet, and Heart Reef; snorkeling at the Great Barrier Reef; one-way helicopter flight; scenic cruise
locations: Airlie Beach,Daydream Island,Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Hill Inlet,Reefworld,Whitehaven

name: Helicopter Tour to Whitehaven Beach
description: Experience the thrill of a helicopter flight to the stunning Whitehaven Beach, one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Enjoy breathtaking aerial views of the Whitsunday Islands and surrounding reefs. Once you arrive, relax on the pristine sands with chilled sparkling wine and water. This 2-hour adventure is perfect for capturing unforgettable photographs and video footage. Join us for a journey that promises excitement and relaxation in equal measure!
departure_times: Check-in 20 minutes prior to departure at Coral Sea Marina.
includes:
Helicopter flight to Whitehaven Beach
75-minute stopover at Whitehaven Beach
Chilled sparkling wine and water
Safety briefing
highlights:
Breathtaking aerial views of Whitsunday Islands and reefs
Relaxing on the beautiful Whitehaven Beach
Opportunity for fantastic photographs and video footage
Sparkling wine and water on the beach
locations: Daydream Island,Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
